page.title: 14A DAY IN TNE LIFE OF A.BLAIR
page.content:
Occupation:{Self employed {Sub-Postman and Newsagent (A'dale)
Friday begins as any other day for me ;my alarm clock rings at{0615.}Time to struggle out of bed and stagger downstairs to open up the sorting office for the arrival of my six postman. Having let the postman in I return upstairs,get dressed and prepare my breakfast _ cereals,toast and tea on a Friday as I have no time to prepare anything cooked.With luck,I will just have time to eat before the arrival of the Hexham postman with all the Allendale areas mail.If not,I leave my breakfast to supervise the sorting of the mail.This usually takes to about{7.15.}By this time W.H.Smiths van should have arrived with the daily papers and,additionally
